donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: This project is for the New Funding Model of the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria.  The overall goal of the HIV/AIDS Component is to reduce HIV related mortality; reduce new HIV infections in adults (15-49); and reduce percentage of infants born to women with HIV.  The project under UNDP Zimbabwe will aim to strengthen the national response to HIV/AIDS. As Principal Recipient of the Global Fund grant, UNDP Zimbabwe will be legally responsible for grant implementation; and responsible for the financial and programmatic management of the grant-financed activities.  In addition, UNDP is accountable for procurement under the grant as well.

project_title: Addressing Critical Gaps HIV Prevention, Treatment, Care
